sense.gloss: kneeling with the balls of the feet on the floor and sitting on one's heels
way of sitting by placing both knees on the ground and standing upright
kneeling down (to pray), going down on one's knees
kneeling and worshipping, worshipping on one's knees

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓たちは↑跪↑↓ひざまず↓いて↑祈↑↓いの↓った。
↑跪↑↓ひざまず↓いてあの↑娘↑↓むすめ↓に↑頼↑↓たの↓んだよ。
sdata.e: And I begged her on my bended knees.
